snippet: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The New York Times, will answer questions from readers this week. Answers will appear Friday on The Fifth Down.
abstract: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The New York Times, will answer questions from readers this week. Answers will appear Friday on The Fifth Down.

headline.main: Have an N.F.L. Question? Judy Battista Has Answers
